ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Tools that stem and lemmatize text.  Stemming is a process that removes endings such as affixes.  Lemmatization is the process of grouping inflected forms together as a single base form.
Tools that stem and lemmatize text.  Stemming is a process that removes endings such as affixes.  Lemmatization is the process of grouping inflected forms together as a single base form.

name: r-textstem
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-textstem
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/textstem_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/textstem/textstem_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 82d7fed3f701bf191d4c921209365b698bf643717174d1a3de26f0a1628970dd

build:
  number: 6
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-snowballc
    - r-dplyr
    - r-hunspell
    - r-korpus
    - r-korpus.lang.en
    - r-lexicon >=0.4.1
    - r-quanteda >=0.99.12
    - r-stringi
    - r-textclean
    - r-textshape
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-snowballc
    - r-dplyr
    - r-hunspell
    - r-korpus
    - r-korpus.lang.en
    - r-lexicon >=0.4.1
    - r-quanteda >=0.99.12
    - r-stringi
    - r-textclean
    - r-textshape

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('textstem')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('textstem')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://github.com/trinker/textstem
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Tools that stem and lemmatize text.  Stemming is a process that removes endings such
    as affixes.  Lemmatization is the process of grouping inflected forms together as
    a single base form.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - philip-khor

# Package: textstem
# Title: Tools for Stemming and Lemmatizing Text
# Version: 0.1.4
# Authors@R: c(person("Tyler", "Rinker", email = "tyler.rinker@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre")))
# Maintainer: Tyler Rinker <tyler.rinker@gmail.com>
# Description: Tools that stem and lemmatize text.  Stemming is a process that removes endings such as affixes.  Lemmatization is the process of grouping inflected forms together as a single base form.
# Depends: R (>= 3.3.0), koRpus.lang.en
# Imports: dplyr, hunspell, koRpus, lexicon (>= 0.4.1), quanteda (>= 0.99.12), SnowballC, stats, stringi, textclean, textshape, utils
# Suggests: testthat
# Date: 2018-04-09
# License: GPL-2
# LazyData: TRUE
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# URL: http://github.com/trinker/textstem
# BugReports: http://github.com/trinker/textstem/issues
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-04-09 13:31:16 UTC; Tyler
# Author: Tyler Rinker [aut, cre]
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-04-09 15:03:04 UTC
